dmca.title: Copyright infringement - Cease and Desist
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: stile [mailto:stile@stileproject.com] 
Sent: Sunday, October 10, 2004 5:21 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright infringement - Cease and Desist

Dear Sirs,

The website www.thyrium.com that you host is infringing on my copyright. 

I run a website located at www.theforum.com, and www.thyrium.com has
blatently taken all image and text from my website and proceeded to display
it on their website as their own.

Their previous host has shut them down for blatently infringing on my
copyright. 

Please ask your client to remove all infringing materials at once, or I will
have to commence legal action against both your company and the operators of
thyrium.com. I will give you one week before I forward this matter to my
attorney and send out DMCA noticed to you and your uplink provider, Level3.
Under the DMCA you have a responsibility to make sure that copyrighted
materials are removed once you have been given notice of such infringing
materials.

I await your response,

Stile Project Inc.
